verses.verse: The king <S%H4428><s%> rejoices <S%H8055><s%> in your strength, <S%H5797><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> How greatly <S%H3966><s%> he rejoices <S%H1523><s%> in your salvation! <S%H3444><s%>
You have given <S%H5414><s%> him his heart <S%H3820><s%>'s desire, <S%H8378><s%> and have not withheld <S%H4513><s%> the request <S%H782><s%> of his lips. <S%H8193><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
For you meet <S%H6923><s%> him with the blessings <S%H1293><s%> of goodness. <S%H2896><s%> You set <S%H7896><s%> a crown <S%H5850><s%> of fine gold <S%H6337><s%> on his head. <S%H7218><s%>
He asked <S%H7592><s%> life <S%H2416><s%> of you, <S%H5414><s%> you gave it to him, <S%H753><s%> even length of days <S%H3117><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
His glory <S%H3519><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> in your salvation. <S%H3444><s%> You lay <S%H7737><s%> honor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty on him. <S%H1926><s%>
For you make <S%H7896><s%> him most blessed <S%H1293><s%> forever. <S%H5703><s%> You make <S%H7896><s%> him glad <S%H8057><s%> with joy in your presence. <S%H6440><s%>
For the king <S%H4428><s%> trusts <S%H982><s%> in Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Through the loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> of the Most High, <S%H5945><s%> he shall not be moved. <S%H4131><s%>
Your hand <S%H3027><s%> will find out <S%H4672><s%> all of your enemies. <S%H341><s%> Your right hand <S%H3225><s%> will find out <S%H4672><s%> those who hate you. <S%H8130><s%>

You will make <S%H7896><s%> them as a fiery <S%H784><s%> furnace <S%H8574><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of your anger. <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will swallow them up <S%H1104><s%> in his wrath. <S%H639><s%> The fire <S%H784><s%> shall devour them. <S%H398><s%>
You will destroy <S%H6><s%> their descendants <S%H6529><s%> from the earth, <S%H776><s%> their posterity <S%H2233><s%> from among the children <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>
For they intended <S%H5186><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against you. <S%H2803><s%> They plotted evil <S%H4209><s%> against you which cannot succeed. <S%H3201><s%>
For you will make <S%H7896><s%> them turn their back, <S%H7926><s%> when you aim <S%H3559><s%> drawn bows <S%H4340><s%> at their face. <S%H6440><s%>
Be exalted, <S%H7311><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> in your strength, <S%H5797><s%> so we will sing <S%H7891><s%> and praise <S%H2167><s%> your power. <S%H1369><s%>
